data.message: The NGS approach overcomes many of the significance challenges associated with conventional phenotypic testing, as well as the limitations of other less comprehensive molecular tests by providing rapid, detailed sequence information for multiple gene regions or whole genomes of interest.

We must have a comprehensive diagnostic test which will help diagnose the latent as well as other forms of tuberculosis in a stipulated time and cost effective. And I can say that Whole Genome Sequencing fulfils all the criteria!

The NGS approach overcomes many of the significance challenges associated with conventional phenotypic testing, as well as the limitations of other less comprehensive molecular tests by providing rapid, detailed sequence information for multiple gene regions or whole genomes of interest.

We must have a comprehensive diagnostic test which will help diagnose the latent as well as other forms of tuberculosis in a stipulated time and cost effective. And I can say that Whole Genome Sequencing fulfils all the criteria!
Whole Genome Sequencing is the future gold standard in DST. It is comprehensive, accessible, affordable, and above all less time-consuming making the technology efficient and effective.
Whole Genome Sequencing has the potential to be the game changer in the treatment of TB and can ensure a bright future for TB patients.
TB WGS is our most powerful weapon for comprehensive, effective, and early diagnosis of TB and drug resistance, and the first and the most crucial step in our END TB Mission.
